Description: US Buyers: No taxes, duties or brokerage fees Guitar comes with OHSC in excellent condition, COA and case candy Case has a few surface scratches Overall condition: - All electronics work as they should. - Frets are in excellent condition. - Neck is straight - Light edge wear - Small surface scratches and very small bumps in the finish. Most of them are invisible on the pictures. - One larger ding on the upper part of the back of body - Very light buckle rash and a few visible surface scratches on the back - No structural damage More pictures available upon request Specifications: - Weight: 8 lbs 13 oz - One P90 Pickup - Chunky 50' neck profile. - Rosewood fretboard - Wrap around bridge - Single Cut Some suggestions: Please note that some settings on this guitar like action, intonation, neck adjustment etc .....may need to be adjusted to your specific style of playing. Also once you have received the guitar you should leave the instrument in the case for at least 6 hours, so the instrument can acclimate to its new environment. Return and refund procedure: Item can be returned within 3 days of receipt. - Item arrived damaged or not as described: Full refund and seller pays for the return shipping costs - The customer didn't like the item (color, tone, neck size, weight etc....): Full refund less 10% restocking fee and buyer pays for the return shipping costs. - No partial refund. - Refund will be issued once the guitar is back in the sellers hand Carriers: - USPS for the United States - Canada Post for Canada
